text: Planning to teach a very introductory Cognitive Modeling course for undergrads with Julia and Pluto next semester. I am guessing at-least half of the students won’t be having any previous programming experience (since we set no programming pre-requisites). The idea is to get them hooked into modeling through demos and then slowly revealing the trick and introducing them to programing concepts in context. Any tips, suggestions, or sharing your experience appreciated :slightly_smiling_face:
